channel.title: Read Error's
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I just followed a tut of CJ's on how to add 100% godsword anims and now i cant make it webclient cus of this. [img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/5434/readerror.png[/img]
Please Help Thanx

item.title: Read Error's
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Change the directory of the sprites. Whatever directory he put it at, change it to yours. So, if his directory was “./cache/Sprites/” and your directory was “./Sprites/”, change it so that it points towards yours.

Read full topic
